Detailed Description

Raw CAN frame.

Central structure for receiving and sending CAN frames.

Examples:

rtcan_rtt.c, rtcanrecv.c, and rtcansend.c.

Field Documentation

can_id_t can_frame::can_id

CAN ID of the frame.

See CAN ID flags for special bits.

Examples:
rtcan_rtt.c.
